Header: A PERSON ARRESTED WITH A FIREARM AND TWO SWORDS IN AMBALANGODA
Content: A man with a firearm and two swords has been arrested in Kuleeagoda area in Ambalangoda. A locally produced 12-barrel firearm, two bullets and 2 swords were seized by the police from a man riding a motorbike during a search operation carried out yesterday based on a tip off received to the Ambalangoda police. The suspect arrested is a 30-year-old resident of Kuleegoda.
